name: Blood Strike (battle royale)
description:
Blood Strike is a fast-paced FPS Battle Royale mobile game optimized for low-end devices and limited storage. Experience 100-player Battle Royale with fully customizable weapons!
Choose from a wide range of Strikers, each with a unique skillset and specialty — Parkour across the battlefield by parachuting, gliding, free running, and zip-lining — Turn the tide of battle with unlimited respawns.
